name: Dreya
info: A Sinner highly contaminated by DisSea. Whenever allied units deal [Life Loss] damage, she will gain 1 M-Value, up to 5 M-Value per second. When the M-value reaches 80, she will enter the [Corruption State], gaining an 8% Attack bonus while consuming 5 M-Value per second. When the M-Value reaches 0, the [Corruption State] will end.
maniaIntensifyText: For each [Life Loss] state carried by the enemy, Dreya gains a 6% Damage increase against them.
criminalRecord:
The subject was once a "Black Ring Expedition" member, venturing deep into [[[DisSea]]] with other scientists to conduct close-range research on the Perishing Star.

Before going to DisSea, the subject was engaged in the first phase of her postdoctoral work at a research institute, focusing on astrophysics research.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
Her power can overcome gravity and other force fields up to a limit, manipulate objects of certain mass to attack, and make nearby physical fragments land in a certain location like meteors.

+++* Arrest Record
The subject appeared alongside overflowing contamination when the Illusory Moon turned full and the DisSea Black Ring was most active. Before she was detained, she was in a transitional state between Sinner and [[[Corruptor]]].

+++* Corruption State
In a state of total corruption. Her entire body is covered in contamination, and almost completely devoid of humanity and rationality. Extremely dangerous.
ecbFlavourText:
"He's right! You guys are a bunch of spherical bastards!"
"What a joke. Just now when they came to chat with me, they said they didn't mean to argue..."
arrestRec1: After the subject was detained near DisSea under the Illusory Moon, she was placed in confinement for observation and treatment. Since it was impossible to communicate with her using normal means, the MBCC was instructed that the Chief would personally reach out to her via dreams.
arrestRec2: The subject was a member of the renowned Black Ring Expeditionary Force. She had voluntarily joined the expedition while working at a research institute, and kept it a secret from her family. While approaching the Perishing Star, the subject and other expedition members discovered data anomalies, and became mentally corroded like all those who ventured into the DisSea Black Ring.
arrestRec3: The subject had lost much of her human characteristics by the [unknown - nd/rd/th] day of the expedition. Probably due to severe mental corrosion, she exhibited hallucinatory and rambling behavior. However, with the help of her companions, and her own will to survive, the subject seemed to have retained a certain level of human consciousness, enabling those who came later to awaken her.
arrestRec4: Ever since witnessing the fall of the Perishing Star and experiencing the Apocalypse as a child, the subject has had a strong passion for both the truth and the unknown. This yearning is on full display in her subconscious, increasing the chance of the MBCC Chief stabilizing her condition.
servingTerm1: Dreya, female, around 173 cm tall post-contamination. Her body is covered with contamination from DisSea, but one can still somewhat make out her previous clothing. She dons a face mask formed by Mania, which is used to control human thinking. She is currently bound in a call by the MBCC Chief's shackles.
servingTerm2: After completing the Mirage dive, the subject has been put back in her cell for further observation. According to observation records, the subject does not show any movements except for breathing motions. Only when Chief appears does she engage in certain actions and dialogue.
servingTerm3: Because she had a strong interest in astronomy and the Perishing Star before getting completely corrupted by contamination, the subject is infatuated with the night sky. She tries her best to ask the Chief to take her to observe celestial bodies and acquire astronomical knowledge.
servingTerm4: Based on information obtained by the deep dive, the subject had been a researcher at a certain research institute before getting completely corrupted by contamination. During the Black Ring Expedition, she insisted on carrying with her six cans of mixed fruit.

++* âš  Hoarder

//You stumble on a pile of objects when entering Dreya's room.//

**System Notifications:** You stumble on a pile of objects when entering Dreya's room. You look down and find a few dozen boxes of coffee beans.

* **Prompt:** Case closed.

**System Notifications:** No wonder the Supply Office has been complaining they keep running out of coffee beans.
supervision2:
++* âš  Where's the Monocle

//Dreya has lost her monocle.//

**System Notifications:** Dreya's monocle is missing and it makes her uneasy. You order dozens of people to search every corner of the MBCC. About an hour later, someone finally finds it on the lawn in the Outdoor Activity Area.

* **Prompt:** Return it to Dreya

**System Notifications:** I probably dropped it when I was gazing at the stars last night.
supervision3:
++* âš âš  Curiosity

//Dreya's mental state seems to have improved these days. Today, she comes to you with a notebook.//

**System Notifications:** Dreya's mental state seems to have improved these days. Today, she comes to you with a notebook.

* **Prompt:** Ask

**Chief:** Dreya, do you need something?

**Dreya:** Could you brief me on the history after we set out on our expedition? I'd like to know what had happened outside during the time I was asleep...

**Chief:** Sure. Let's start with the foundation of DisCity then.

**Dreya:** Okay.

**Chief:** In N.F. 23, Dr. Keylan discovered the [[[Hypercube]]], a substance resistant to the catastrophe, and contained the spreading of the disaster. Two years later, [[[EDGE]]] was founded. Based on this agreement, mankind built DisCity and began mining Hypercubes.

* **Prompt:** Talk about [[[Syndicate]]]

**Chief:** Syndicate is part of DisCity. It was once the brightest gem on DisCity's crown at the peak of its mining industry.

**Chief:** But since N.F. 84, due to the ruin of the DisSea mines and the fall of the mining industry, Syndicate's prosperity had quickly declined and it'd descended into disorder, slowly becoming a breeding ground for illegal gangs and crimes. Even today, violence and unrest are still rampant there.

* **Prompt:** Talk about [[[Eastside]]]

**Chief:** Eastside was founded later than Syndicate. It's a new commercial and entertainment district. After the [[[DisSea Explosion]]], enterprises from different sectors of the West District all began migrating to Eastside.

**Chief:** Eastside has since grown into the most prosperous district of DisCity. Its entertainment businesses have flourished and eventually become the pillar of Eastside's economy...

**System Notifications:** The afternoon slips past unnoticed.

**Chief:** We've covered a lot of things today. Let's call it a day.

**Dreya:** Can I come again tomorrow for more stories?

**Chief:** Of course. Tomorrow, let's do a deep dive on... um... the Black Rings.
supervision4:
++* âš âš  Stargazing

//The sky is clear tonight, perfect for stargazing.//

**System Notifications:** The sky is clear tonight, perfect for stargazing, so you take Dreya to the Outdoor Activity Area.

* **Prompt:** Sit on the lawn together

**Chief:** You like looking at stars, don't you?

**Dreya:** I don't remember...

**Dreya:** But when I see a sky full of stars, somehow I feel at peace... and hopeful?

**Chief:** Do you still remember the names of these stars?

**Dreya:** Not at all...

**Chief:** That's okay. See the nebula over there? It's only visible when the sky is very clear.

**System Notifications:** She looks toward where you're pointing and finds the nebula seemingly shrouded by faint white light among the stars. She nods.

**Chief:** That's the Andromeda Galaxy 2.5 million light years away from Earth. When you look at it, the starlight that enters your eyes now was in fact emitted by the earliest ancestors of mankind.

**Chief:** Perhaps the reason why we find the vast sea of stars mesmerizing is that it constantly reminds us of the unknown that's yet to be discovered and conquered on the other side of the universe.

**Dreya:** ...How impressive.

**Dreya:** Can you tell me more about the other stars?

**Chief:** Sure. Look over there...
supervision5:
++* âš âš âš  Canned Fruit

//While tidying the Sinners' files, you read Dreya's profile.//

**System Notifications:** While tidying the Sinners' files, you learn that Dreya's favorite food used to be canned fruit. So you grab a can from the kitchen and bring it to her, hoping to help her recall the related memories.

**Chief:** Dreya? I've brought you a treat.

**Dreya:** What... is this?

**Chief:** Try it.

**Dreya:** Delicious... The taste reminds me of something...

**Chief:** This is canned fruit. This used to be your favorite.

**Dreya:** I see...

**Chief:** I guess it's because it lasts long and is portable? After all, back then you spent a lot of time in the lab or on field trips.

**Dreya:** Hmm... Sugar helps our brains think indeed.

**System Notifications:** Dreya scoops another piece of peach and tastes it. Her eyes suddenly brighten as if something springs to mind.

**Dreya:** I remember now... A senior in the lab was allergic to peaches, so she always gave hers to me...

* **Prompt:** Encouragement

**Chief:** Great, can you think of anything else?

**Dreya:** ...I don't think so.

**System Notifications:** She shakes her head and pushes the can to you.

**Dreya:** You have some too.

* **Prompt:** Eat
 * **Chief:** Just a nibble...
 * **Chief:** You just said sugar helped our brains think. I've been busy with paperwork these days, I'm afraid I need it.

* **Prompt:** Don't eat it
 * **Chief:** Thanks, but I'm not a fan of sweets. I appreciate it though.
 * **Chief:** Save the can for yourself. If you want more, go grab some in the kitchen. They have many different flavors there.
supervision6:
++* âš âš âš  Listener

//Although Dreya is quite introverted, many people in the Bureau like to chat with her.//

**System Notifications:** Although Dreya is quite introverted, many people in the Bureau like to chat with her.

**[[[Sumire]]]:** The flowers have bloomed in the greenhouse, so I went to pick some. Are you interested in flower arrangement? The most basic techniques include...

**Dreya:** I see, I see. The thematic style, the arc style, the triangular style...

**[[[Pepper]]]:** Hehe, it's the season to plant some vegetables! Why does everybody find growing vegetables some kind of tedious manual labor? There's a ton of knowledge involved. For example, while some vegetables can survive winter, most can't...

**Dreya:** I see, I see. Broad beans, peas, choy sum, asparagus, and shepherd's purse can survive winter...

**[[[OwO]]]:** Are you interested in lion dance? How about you become my apprentice? I'll teach you all my secret lion dance moves! First and foremost...

**Dreya:** I see, I see. The key is to present the lion's emotions animatedly...

**System Notifications:** At first, the conversations were pretty normal, but they soon begin to get out of hand.

**[[[Roulecca]]]:** I'm explaining the skill I use for dice games seriously. Why doesn't anyone want to listen to me?

**Dreya:** I see, I see. Just throw the dice confidently and you'll surely get a six...

**Chief:** ?

**[[[Demolia]]]:** Here's my secret pickled vegetable recipe. I don't share this with everyone...

**Dreya:** I see, I see. First step, steal [[[demon |Demon's]]] shield...

**Chief:** ??

**[[[Che]]]:** Sigh, they've put more staff on patrol these days so it's getting harder to skip training, but there are still a few blind spots left. Hey, you must not tell anyone about this...

**Dreya:** I see, I see. The bush in the greenhouse, the kitchen, and the tool room in the corner of the Outdoor Activity Area... The janitor in charge of that area often forgets to lock the door...

**Chief:** ???

* **Prompt:** Intervene
 * **Chief:** Stop! Stop it now!
 * **Chief:** Don't memorize everything they tell you! It'll do you no good!

* **Prompt:** Don't intervene
 * **Chief:** Maybe you should follow her discreetly to note down all these //secret messages.//
 * **Chief:** I'll go after them one by one and catch them red-handed tomorrow!
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
The crimson full moon rises... You used the unknown to catch me... You... are the black hole of secrets I long for.

[Raise to Phase 1]
Have you... solved the inscrutable riddle about me?

[Raise to Phase 3]
Break all the shackles and peer into my deepest secrets.

[Level Start]
There's nothing I wish to seek here.

[Win Battles]
This mission... might be worth something, but barely...

[Lose Battles]
This mission has become meaningless. Don't waste any more time...

[Ultimate Skill]
The red heat shall devour everything!

[Die in Battles]
The stars... shall ultimately die in darkness.

[Greeting]
No, no... Argh! I-is that you? Oh good... you came.

[Conversation 1]
I want... I want to unearth all the unknowns of the world, and watch as 100 billion suns collapse into black holes of doom...

[Conversation 2]
Quick... hurry. Let me go seek and explore and research and devour all the secrets... until they completely vanish from my consciousness.

[Conversation 3]
It's howling and tormenting me... and pushing me to get all your secrets...

[Special Conversation 1]
Me...? I survived by devouring secrets of the unknown... Yeah, that's all...

[Special Conversation 2]
I shall always remember... how that red star fell into the sea... It brought forth endless knowledge, secrets, affairs and mysteries... Ah, how intriguing it is.

[Special Conversation 3]
I went to that place in search of the unknown... It really satisfies me, but I think, you can make me feel the same way.

[Full Compliance]
Quantum fields attract and distort space-time, while you and your secrets... attract me... I can't help but be drawn to you, and fall... I cannot escape, yet... I have no regrets.

[Idle]
Instead of lingering by my side, why not come a bit closer...

[Annoyed]
No need to tell me what this move means... I don't want to know.

[Special Attention]
It's extremely dangerous to gaze at the Black Hole... It won't respond to you. It'll just rip you apart and devour you...

[Dispatch]
I don't want to be too far away from you.

[Dispatch Complete]
The things that are already known to humans are worthless.

[Level Up]
Push the limits.

[Pat Head]
Do you also want to break through mankind's greatest defenses and peek into their secrets?

exclusiveCrimebrand.description:
Gains a 10%/15%/20% [Life Loss] damage boost. The new exclusive Ultimate [Tempestuous Pull] is now available.
[Tempestuous Pull]: Copies the [Life Loss] states carried by enemies within the 3x3 square and switches the skill to [Cosmos Storm]. Can only be used twice per battle.
[Cosmos Storm]: Applies the [Life Loss] states copied by [Tempestuous Pull] to all enemies on the field and switches the skill to [Tempestuous Pull]. (If the original source of a [Life Loss] state has died, that particular [Life Loss] state cannot be applied.)

guide.title: Summary
guide.text:
Enables all [Life Loss] Sinners, but also only works in a specifc team composition consisting of Levy, Sumire and Pepper. Make sure you only use her skill when she is in the [Corruption State] and the disc behind her back is glowing to unleash her full dmg potential. Her ECB buffs her dmg and prolongs [Life Loss] effects.

For more information on this comp, please refer to Yjndae's Bleed guide.

cons: Only strong when used with other bleed team members
ECB can only be used twice per battle

upgrade.description: Damage is increased to $0%. Additional damage increases to $0% of total damage dealt.

skills.description:

skills.description: Gains a 6% Attack boost. The damage intervals of all [Life Loss] states inflicted by allied units on the field shorten by 0.067 seconds.

attireVoicelines1:
[Attire Obtained]
This is a gathering of the stars... In this vast emptiness, the only ones attending the feast are me... and you...

[Greeting]
Climb up the stairs and join me... If you stop just for these bouquets, you'll miss out on the spectacular view of the starry sky...

[Ordinary Contact 1]
That celestial body encircling us is the mere shadow of the same star... A black hole hides it well by warping and refracting the light... But now, I'll guide you to fully perceive its existence.

[Ordinary Contact 2]
The stars converge in the cosmos, and I yearn to uncover all their secrets... Even if it means becoming one of them, torn apart for closing the distance... I simply can't resist...

[Idle] 
It's getting closer... The red full moon...

[Annoyed]
If you wish to get closer to me, instead of tangling with my hem, why don't you... tell me your secrets.

[Special Attention] 
Are you looking upon this sea of stars... or are you looking... at me?

[Level Up}
The more the stars burn, the brighter they shine...
